DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot randomised controlled trial (RCT) to investigate the effect of postoperative face-down positioning on the outcome of macular hole surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Randomised Controlled Trial of Posturing Following Surgery for Full-thickness Macular Hole
DOC.criteria: full thickness macular hole >16 years old any history of previous intraocular surgery (including cataract surgery) history of ocular trauma history of visual loss greater than 1 year
